refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: GooCanvasItemSimple is used as a base class for all of the standard canvas items. It can also be used as the base class for new custom canvas items.
It provides default implementations for many of the GooCanvasItem methods.
For very simple items, all that is needed is to implement the create_path() method. (GooCanvasEllipse, GooCanvasRect and GooCanvasPath do this.)

More complicated items need to implement the update(), paint() and is_item_at() methods. (GooCanvasImage, GooCanvasPolyline, GooCanvasText and GooCanvasWidget do this.) They may also need to override some of the other GooCanvasItem methods such as set_canvas(), set_parent() or allocate_area() if special code is needed. (GooCanvasWidget does this to make sure the GtkWidget is embedded in the GooCanvas widget correctly.)

refsect2.para: The GooCanvasItemSimple struct contains the basic data needed to implement canvas items.

refsect2.title: GooCanvasItemSimpleClass
refsect2.para: The GooCanvasItemSimpleClass struct contains several methods that subclasses can override.
Simple items need only implement the create_path() method. More complex items must override the update(), paint() and is_item_at() methods.

listitem.simpara: simple subclasses that draw basic shapes and paths only need to override this one method. It creates the path for the item. All updating, painting and hit-testing is provided automatically by the GooCanvasItemSimple class. (This method is used by the builtin GooCanvasEllipse, GooCanvasRect and GooCanvasPath items.)
subclasses should override this to calculate their new bounds, in user space.
subclasses should override this to paint their item.
subclasses should override this to do hit-testing.

refsect2.title: goo_canvas_item_simple_check_style ()
refsect2.para: This function is intended to be used by subclasses of GooCanvasItemSimple, typically in their update() or get_requested_area() methods.

It ensures that the item's style is setup correctly. If the item has its own GooCanvasStyle it makes sure the parent is set correctly. If it doesn't have its own style it uses the parent item's style.

listitem.simpara: a GooCanvasItemSimple.

refsect2.title: goo_canvas_item_simple_get_path_bounds ()
refsect2.para: This function is intended to be used by subclasses of GooCanvasItemSimple, typically in their update() or get_requested_area() methods.
It calculates the bounds of the current path, using the item's style settings, and stores the results in the given GooCanvasBounds struct.

The returned bounds contains the bounding box of the path in device space, converted to user space coordinates. To calculate the bounds completely in user space, use cairo_identity_matrix() to temporarily reset the current transformation matrix to the identity matrix.

listitem.simpara: a GooCanvasItemSimple.
a cairo context.
the GooCanvasBounds struct to store the resulting bounding box.

refsect2.title: goo_canvas_item_simple_user_bounds_to_device ()
refsect2.para: This function is intended to be used by subclasses of GooCanvasItemSimple, typically in their update() or get_requested_area() methods.
It converts the item's bounds to a bounding box in device space.

listitem.simpara: a GooCanvasItemSimple.
a cairo context.
the bounds of the item, in the item's coordinate space.

refsect2.title: goo_canvas_item_simple_user_bounds_to_parent ()
refsect2.para: This function is intended to be used by subclasses of GooCanvasItemSimple, typically in their get_requested_area() method.
It converts the item's bounds to a bounding box in its parent's coordinate space. If the item has no transformation matrix set then no conversion is needed.

listitem.simpara: a GooCanvasItemSimple.
a cairo context.
the bounds of the item, in the item's coordinate space.

refsect2.title: goo_canvas_item_simple_paint_path ()
refsect2.para: This function is intended to be used by subclasses of GooCanvasItemSimple.

refsect2.title: goo_canvas_item_simple_changed ()
refsect2.para: This function is intended to be used by subclasses of GooCanvasItemSimple.
It is used as a callback for the "changed" signal of the item models. It requests an update or redraw of the item as appropriate.

listitem.simpara: a GooCanvasItemSimple.
if the item's bounds need to be recomputed.

refsect2.title: The "antialias" property
refsect2.para: The antialiasing mode to use.
Default value: CAIRO_ANTIALIAS_GRAY

refsect2.title: The "clip-fill-rule" property
refsect2.para: The fill rule used to determine which parts of the item are clipped.
Default value: CAIRO_FILL_RULE_WINDING

refsect2.title: The "clip-path" property
refsect2.para: The sequence of commands describing the clip path of the item, specified as a string using the same syntax as in the Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) path element.
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The "fill-color" property
refsect2.para: The color to use to paint the interior of the item. To disable painting set the 'fill-pattern' property to NULL.
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The "fill-color-rgba" property
refsect2.para: The color to use to paint the interior of the item, specified as a 32-bit integer value. To disable painting set the 'fill-pattern' property to NULL.
Default value: 0

refsect2.title: The "fill-pattern" property
refsect2.para: The pattern to use to paint the interior of the item, or NULL to disable painting.

refsect2.title: The "fill-pixbuf" property
refsect2.para: The pixbuf to use to paint the interior of the item. To disable painting set the 'fill-pattern' property to NULL.

refsect2.title: The "fill-rule" property
refsect2.para: The fill rule used to determine which parts of the item are filled.
Default value: CAIRO_FILL_RULE_WINDING

refsect2.title: The "font" property
refsect2.para: The base font to use for the text.
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The "font-desc" property
refsect2.para: The attributes specifying which font to use.

refsect2.title: The "hint-metrics" property
refsect2.para: The hinting to be used for font metrics.
Default value: CAIRO_HINT_METRICS_OFF

refsect2.title: The "line-cap" property
refsect2.para: The line cap style to use.
Default value: CAIRO_LINE_CAP_BUTT

refsect2.title: The "line-dash" property
refsect2.para: The dash pattern to use.

refsect2.title: The "line-join" property
refsect2.para: The line join style to use.
Default value: CAIRO_LINE_JOIN_MITER

refsect2.title: The "line-join-miter-limit" property
refsect2.para: The smallest angle to use with miter joins, in degrees. Bevel joins will be used below this limit.
Allowed values: >= 0
Default value: 10

refsect2.title: The "line-width" property
refsect2.para: The line width to use for the item's perimeter.
Allowed values: >= 0
Default value: 0

refsect2.title: The "operator" property
refsect2.para: The compositing operator to use.
Default value: CAIRO_OPERATOR_OVER

refsect2.title: The "stroke-color" property
refsect2.para: The color to use for the item's perimeter. To disable painting set the 'stroke-pattern' property to NULL.
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The "stroke-color-rgba" property
refsect2.para: The color to use for the item's perimeter, specified as a 32-bit integer value. To disable painting set the 'stroke-pattern' property to NULL.
Default value: 0

refsect2.title: The "stroke-pattern" property
refsect2.para: The pattern to use to paint the perimeter of the item, or NULL disable painting.

refsect2.title: The "stroke-pixbuf" property
refsect2.para: The pixbuf to use to draw the item's perimeter. To disable painting set the 'stroke-pattern' property to NULL.
